scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build-index && npm run build-main && npm run build-panel && npm run build-error && npm run build-fps && npm run build-event && build-webpack-plugin
scripts.build-main: ksr build -e mt.ts:path=mt --hash false --library Mt --target umd
scripts.build-panel: ksr build -e mt-panel.ts:path=mt-panel --hash false --library MtPanel --target umd
scripts.build-error: ksr build -e mt-error.ts:path=mt-error --hash false --library MtError --target umd
scripts.build-fps: ksr build -e mt-fps.ts:path=mt-fps --hash false --library MtFps --target umd
scripts.build-event: ksr build -e event.ts:path=event --hash false --library EventBus --target umd
